description:
This STAC catalog is a basic demonstration highlighting Vermont agriculture, wetlands, and shublands.

This catalog was created using the following steps:

 • Used rasterio to read raster bounds, pyproj to reproject coordinates to WGS84, and shapely to create the footprint polygon.

 • Created STAC Items for each raster using pystac, attached geometry and bounding box from the previous step.

 • Added each raster as an asset to its item with pystac, then created a catalog with pystac.
